Text: The bank targets a cost-to-income ratio of 70% by 2022 by cutting some €6 billion ($6.6 billion) in annual expenses and some revenue growth, which should be the key to reach its profitability target in the medium term.
Cause: cutting some €6 billion ($6.6 billion) in annual expenses and some revenue growth, which should be the key to reach its profitability target in the medium term.
Effect: The bank targets a cost-to-income ratio of 70% by 2022
Sentence: <e2>The bank targets a cost-to-income ratio of 70% by 2022</e2> by <e1>cutting some €6 billion ($6.6 billion) in annual expenses and some revenue growth, which should be the key to reach its profitability target in the medium term.</e1>
